comment: Honestly nice man. Heavy accent so hard to understand but he will help and go over things with you if needed. Explained things thoroughly. My class thought he was so bad but looking back i realize he was one of the best lab professors I've had so far. accepted late work. Wants his students to do good. helped w graded assignments as much he could.
he just didnt know how to teach but he was nice
He's alright I guess. Really good at organizing a clear schedule with easy to follow assignments. His accent is difficult to understand sometimes, but that is really my only complaint.
